name: unchecked
content:

If something harmful is unchecked, it is continuing or increasing without or despite any limits or attempts to prevent it: If current trends go/continue unchecked, obesity will become the number one cause of death in this country. The war raged on, unchecked by the UN's efforts to stop it. Synonym
unbridled
